extensions.name: Patch
extensions.description: Patch for Oxygen Builder to allow extending it beyond the limits.

extensions.name: Plain Classes
extensions.description:
Simplified Classes for Oxygen Builder. Wakaloka Plain Classes is a tool that allow you to input plain classes on oxygen editor and bypass many step that run by oxygen selector system.

You will have no empty css classes rule just to use external css.

extensions.name: Oxywind
extensions.description: Tailwind CSS Integration for Oxygen Builder.

extensions.name: Oxyvir
extensions.description: Master Styles Integration for Oxygen Builder.
